fields.label: Registering Office
fields.summary: To be filled out by BIR (Head Office, Branch, Facility).

fields.label: BIR Registration Date
fields.summary: To be filled out by BIR (MM/DD/YYYY).

fields.label: PhilSys Card Number (PCN)
fields.summary: Write PCN as shown on your PhilSys/ePhilID card.

fields.label: Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN)
fields.summary: Write existing TIN (if any); leave blank if applying for new TIN.

fields.label: RDO Code
fields.summary: To be filled out by BIR if you have an existing TIN.

fields.label: Taxpayer Type
fields.summary: Tick the correct category: • Single Proprietor • Professional (licensed/in general) • Mixed Income Earner • Resident/Non-Resident Alien • Estate • Trust.

fields.label: Taxpayer’s Name
fields.summary: Write Last, First, Middle, Suffix, Nickname (if estate/trust, follow special format on form).

fields.label: Gender
fields.summary: Tick Male or Female.

fields.label: Civil Status
fields.summary: Tick Single, Married, Widow/er, or Legally Separated.

fields.label: Date of Birth/Organization
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY (for individuals, estates, or trusts).

fields.label: Place of Birth
fields.summary: Write city/municipality, province, or country.

fields.label: Mother’s Maiden Name
fields.summary: Write full maiden name.

fields.label: Father’s Name
fields.summary: Write full father’s name.

fields.label: Citizenship
fields.summary: Write primary citizenship.

fields.label: Other Citizenship
fields.summary: If dual/multiple, list other citizenships.

fields.label: Local Residence Address
fields.summary: Fill Unit/Room/Floor, Building Name, Lot/Block, Street, Subdivision, Barangay, Town/City, Province, ZIP.

fields.label: Business Address
fields.summary: Fill full address of business location (same fields as residence).

fields.label: Foreign Address
fields.summary: If applicable, write complete foreign address.

fields.label: Municipality Code
fields.summary: To be filled out by BIR.

fields.label: Purpose of TIN Application
fields.summary: To be filled out by BIR (e.g., new, update, etc.).

fields.label: Identification Details
fields.summary: Write government ID type, ID number, effectivity and expiry dates, issuer, and country of issue.

fields.label: Preferred Contact Type
fields.summary: Write contact numbers and email (email is required).

fields.label: 8% Income Tax Rate Option
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No if availing 8% flat income tax in lieu of graduated rates.

fields.label: Expected Annual Gross Sales
fields.summary: Tick one: • Micro (< P3M) • Small (P3M–<P20M) • Medium (P20M–<P1B) • Large (≥ P1B).

fields.label: Employment Status of Spouse
fields.summary: Tick: Unemployed • Employed Locally • Employed Abroad • Engaged in Business/Profession.

fields.label: Spouse Name
fields.summary: Write Last, First, Middle, Suffix.

fields.label: Spouse TIN
fields.summary: Write spouse’s TIN if available.

fields.label: Spouse Employer’s Name
fields.summary: Write employer’s registered name.

fields.label: Spouse Employer’s TIN
fields.summary: Write employer’s TIN if available.

fields.label: Representative Name
fields.summary: If individual, write Last, First, Middle, Suffix. If non-individual, write registered name.

fields.label: Relationship
fields.summary: Write relationship to taxpayer (e.g., lawyer, accountant, agent).

fields.label: Date
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY of authorization.

fields.label: Address
fields.summary: Fill Unit/Room/Floor, Building, Lot/Block, Street, Subdivision, Barangay, Town/City, Province, ZIP.

fields.label: Preferred Contact Type
fields.summary: Write landline, mobile, and email (email required).

fields.label: Single Business/Philippine Business Number
fields.summary: Write assigned number if any.

fields.label: Primary/Secondary Industries
fields.summary: Write trade/business names, regulatory body, registration numbers, registration dates, PSIC codes, and lines of business.

fields.label: Incentives Details
fields.summary: If applicable, fill promotion agency, legal basis, incentive granted, no. of years, and start/end dates.

fields.label: Registration/Accreditation Details
fields.summary: Write number, effectivity date, date issued, registered activity, tax regime, activity start and end dates.

fields.label: Facility Type & Address
fields.summary: Tick type (PP, SP, WH, SR, GG, BT, RP, Others). Fill full address details.

fields.label: Tax Types
fields.summary: To be filled out by BIR: check applicable taxes (Income Tax, VAT, Percentage Tax, Withholding, DST, etc.).

fields.label: BIR Printed Invoices
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If Yes, fill type (VAT/NON-VAT), number of booklets, serial numbers (start–end).

fields.label: Authority to Print Invoices
fields.summary: Write printer’s name, TIN, accreditation number, date, registered address, contact, email, manner (bound/loose), invoice description, serial ranges.

fields.label: Type of Multiple Employments
fields.summary: Tick Successive or Concurrent. If successive, list previous employer/s. If concurrent, list secondary employer/s.

fields.label: Employer Name & TIN
fields.summary: Write names and TINs of employer/s.

fields.label: Relationship Start Date
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY.

fields.label: Contact Type
fields.summary: Write contact numbers and email (email required).

fields.label: Declaration
fields.summary: Sign over printed name to declare accuracy; give consent for Data Privacy Act compliance.

fields.label: Payment Order Form (BIR use)
fields.summary: For BIR officer only: payment details, eROR/ROR number, penalties, total payable.
